snippet.title: Capybara: The story of Sisyphus - Game trailer
snippet.description:
Game trailer - Capybara: The story of Sisyphus! The game will be released on May 14, 2024, and will be free to play!

You play as a very lazy capybara who must climb a mountain to bathe in his barrel! Game: Capybara: The story of Sisyphus

It seemed that the capybara had already accepted her fate and would not be able to take a bath. Be prepared for falls, try not to get stuck and move on with the help of a barrel. Go through different eras and find yourself at your goal! Get to the top of the mountain!

You have a rope with a barrel to balance yourself while climbing.
Use all your experience to keep the capybara.

#gametrailers #capybarathestoryofsisyphus #underdogs
